titles.title: A joint resolution providing for the reappointment of Patricia Q. Stonesifer as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.
Senate Committee on Rules and Administration discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. Brady (PA) moved to suspend the rules and pass the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S.J. Res. 8.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

bill.summary:
12/21/2007--Public Law. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Reappoints Patricia Q. Stonesifer as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.
